title: Handkerchief, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
dimensions:
Overall: 38.5 x 38 cm (15 3/16 x 14 15/16 in.)
Warp: 38 cm (15 in.)
Weft: Right selvedge only: 38.5 cm (15 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Simeon Braguin
description:
Border: red
Field: Cards surrounding the border, each with a letter of the alphabet and legend.  Horseman and legend.  In the center, "A STANDS FOR ARMY FIGHTING THE BOERS".

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Simeon Braguin. 1981-11-7.
